 2004-07382004-05-21,  ,  ,  PMO,  , 
ActNational Research Council Act
PrecisAppointment of MICHAEL RAYMONT of Ottawa, Ontario, as President of the National Research Council of Canada, on an acting basis, until such time as a President is appointed, to hold office during pleasure, effective July 2, 2004.
